text: Jorge Gotor Blas (born 14 April 1987) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for AD San Juan de Mozarrifar as a central defender. ==Club career== Born in Zaragoza, Aragon, Gotor graduated from the youth academy of local Real Zaragoza and made his senior debut with their reserves in the 2005–06 season, in Segunda División B. He went on to represent fellow league teams RCD Espanyol B, Real Murcia Imperial, Real Murcia, Getafe CF B, CD Atlético Baleares and CD Guijuelo. In the summer of 2014, Gotor moved abroad for the first time in his career and signed for Iraqi club Erbil SC alongside compatriot Borja Rubiato. Although he had a contract running until 25 January 2015, he left the country and returned to Spain in August following the bombings of the city. On 7 August 2015, Gotor returned to the Spanish third level by joining CD Eldense. On 18 January 2017, he moved to Mitra Kukar F.C. of Liga 1 (Indonesia) as a replacement for the departing Arthur Cunha. After a stint in the Maldives with New Radiant SC, 31-year-old Gotor signed with Bangladeshi team Bashundhara Kings on 1 October 2018. ==International career== Gotor was capped by Spain at under-17 level. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Zaragoza Category:Spanish footballers Category:Aragonese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Real Zaragoza B players Category:RCD Espanyol B footballers Category:Real Murcia Imperial players Category:Real Murcia players Category:Getafe CF B players Category:CD Atlético Baleares footballers Category:CD Guijuelo footballers Category:CD Eldense footballers Category:Erbil SC players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:Mitra Kukar players Category:New Radiant SC players Category:Bangladesh Football Premier League players Category:Bashundhara Kings players Category:Spain youth international footballers Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Iraq Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Expatriate footballers in the Maldives Category:Expatriate footballers in Bangladesh Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Indonesia
title: Jorge Gotor
